sentence.text: The concomitant administration of Exjade and aluminum-containing antacid preparations has not been formally studied.
sentence.negationtags: The concomitant administration of Exjade and aluminum-containing antacid preparations has <scope> <cue> not </cue> been formally studied. </scope>

sentence.text: Although deferasirox has a lower affinity for aluminum than for iron, Exjade should not be taken with aluminum-containing antacid preparations.
sentence.negationtags: Although deferasirox has a lower affinity for aluminum than for iron, Exjade should <scope> <cue> not </cue> be taken with aluminum-containing antacid preparations. </scope>

sentence.text: In healthy volunteers, Exjade had no effect on the pharmacokinetics of digoxin.
sentence.negationtags: In healthy volunteers, Exjade had <scope> <cue> no </cue> effect on the pharmacokinetics of digoxin. </scope>

sentence.text: The effect of digoxin on Exjade pharmacokinetics has not been studied.
sentence.negationtags: The effect of digoxin on Exjade pharmacokinetics has <scope> <cue> not </cue> been studied. </scope>

sentence.text: The concomitant administration of Exjade and vitamin C has not been formally studied.
sentence.negationtags: The concomitant administration of Exjade and vitamin C has <scope> <cue> not </cue> been formally studied. </scope>

sentence.text: Doses of vitamin C up to 200 mg were allowed in clinical studies without negative consequences.
sentence.negationtags: Doses of vitamin C up to 200 mg were allowed in clinical studies <scope> <cue> without </cue> negative consequences. </scope>

sentence.text: The interaction of Exjade with hydroxyurea has not been formally studied.
sentence.negationtags: The interaction of Exjade with hydroxyurea has <scope> <cue> not </cue> been formally studied. </scope>

sentence.text: No inhibition of deferasirox metabolism by hydroxyurea is expected based on the results of an in vitro study.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> <cue> No </cue> inhibition of deferasirox metabolism by hydroxyurea is expected based on the results of an in vitro study. </scope>

sentence.text: Exjade should not be combined with other iron chelator therapies, as safety of such combinations has not been established.
sentence.negationtags: Exjade should <scope> <cue> not </cue> be combined with other iron chelator therapies, as safety of such combinations has not been established. </scope>

sentence.text: Drug/Food Interactions The bioavailability (AUC) of deferasirox was variably increased when taken with a meal.
Deferasirox should be taken on an empty stomach 30 minutes before eating.
Exjade tablets for oral suspension can be dispersed in water, orange juice, or apple juice.
